name: Super Mario Death Row 2: Shroomshank Redemption
name_original: Super Mario Death Row 2: Shroomshank Redemption
description:
Wuh-oh! Looks like Mario's gotten himself in a bit of a pinch! He appears to be safe and sound in the sewers of the Mushroom Kingdom...but how? A mysterious savior seems to have taken pity to Mario's sorry ROM-downloading soul.

Executions. Criminals on the run. Video game emulation. Shitty Bowser figurines. Nintendo executives rendered in loving 320x240 resolution, just like God intended. It's all here, baby. Super Mario Death Row 2: Shroomshank Redemption is the sequel to 2021's Super Mario Death Row, the world-renowned experimental playable Nintendo Direct made to celebrate Mario's 35th anniversary.

--------------------------------------------

This package includes both the sequel and the original in one package - simply select which Direct you'd like to play first from the in-game Youtube Browser. The game is controllable immediately from start-up, so don't fret when there's no title screen. Just move your mouse around and select that play button.

Z interacts, with X opening the menu. Shift will fasten dialog boxes, although this is only recommended on repeat playthroughs as the text-timing is imperative to several jokes.

Play time runs anywhere from 10 minutes to 30 depending on the pace you play at. Have fun!

SUPER PLAYER TIPS:

  • Talk to Wario multiple times in Death Row 1 for more fun facts!
  • Go back to your jail cell after talking to Luigi! You might find a surprise visitor...
  • Check every question block! You never know what you might find, after all.
  • You can load your game by clicking the Resume Watching text in the top right on startup!

If you're a streamer or a Youtuber of some sort, please credit me and link back to this page in the description! And please comment or DM me if you end up playin' it; I love seeing folks have fun with my goofs. :D
